def transform_ascii_art(ascii_art):
    lines = ascii_art.strip().split('')
    rotated_art = [''.join([lines[j][i] for j in range(len(lines) - 1, -1, -1)]) for i in range(len(lines[0]))]
    flipped_art = '\n'.join(reversed(rotated_art))
    return flipped_art
